name: Firefly Witbier
ingredients: 6lb Belgian Pils, 4.6lb White Summer Wheat, 9.6oz Flaked Oats, 1.0oz 5.2% EK Goldings - 60min, 0.5oz 5.2% Styrian Goldings - 10min, 0.5oz 5.2% Styrian Goldings - @knockout, 0.5oz Curacao Orange Peel, 0.5oz Sweet Orange Peel, 2.0oz Coriander Seed, 5ml Lactic Acid, Wyeast #3944 Belgian White Ale Yeast, Several Fireflies
